remarks: The norm of a group product, provided the ` ZZ ` -module is normed. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Nov-2017.)
statement:
nmmulg.x $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
nmmulg.n $e |- N = ( norm ` R ) $.
nmmulg.z $e |- Z = ( ZMod ` R ) $.
nmmulg.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) $.
nmmulg $p |- ( ( Z e. NrmMod /\ M e. ZZ /\ X e. B ) -> ( N ` ( M .x. X ) ) = ( ( abs ` M ) x. ( N ` X ) ) ) $.
